title: A godly and necessarye admonition of the decrees and canons of the Counsel of Trent, celebrated vnder Pius the fourth, Byshop of Rome, in the yeares of our Lord. M.D.LXII. and. M.D.LXIII. Wrytten for those godlye disposed persons sakes, whych looke for amendement of doctrine and ceremonies to bee made by generall counsels. Lately translated out of Latine.
author: Flacius Illyricus, Matthias, 1520-1575.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Iohn Day, dwellyng ouer Aldersgate, beneath Saint Martins. Cum gratia et priuilegio Regi√¶ Maiestatis per septennium. The. xix. of February. 1564. These bookes are to be sold at hys shop vnder the gate,
